content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Maria. I appreciate your interest. However, I'm afraid I cannot accept the rental price you have proposed. I would need a higher price to cover my costs and maximize my gains. Is there any room for negotiation?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, I am willing to negotiate with you. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: My proposed rental price is 800 Euros per month. This price takes into consideration the location, size, and condition of the apartment, as well as my costs as a landlord. Is this price within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I can afford that. Can we agree on that price?

I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Excellent, Maria. I am glad we could come to an agreement on the rental price. I will send you a contract to review and sign, and once that is done, you can move in. Thank you for your interest in the apartment, and I look forward to your tenancy.
name: Heinrich Heine
